This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsPlace: My friends house in her drive way Notice: Bright and golden light, looked like a star pulsating Object: firs thought it was a star then noticed it accended slowly up and then vanished Actions: It slowly accended up, took about 30-45 seconds and then vanished in under a second Feelings: I was scared but then I was a bit excited... it was my first "real" look at one Lose Sight: It vanished in under a second
